original_text: He said to them, ‘Go into the village that is in front of you. When you arrive there, you will immediately see a donkey tied there with her young donkey. Undo the ropes and bring both the donkeys here to me.
korean_text: 이르시되 너희는 맞은편 마을로 가라 그리하면 곧 매인 나귀와 나귀 새끼가 함께 있는 것을 보리니 풀어 내게로 끌고 오라

sentences.original_text: that is in front of you
you will immediately see a donkey
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 즉시 나귀 한 마리를 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: tied there with her young donkey
sentences.korean_translation: 어린 나귀와 함께 거기에 묶여 있는

sentences.original_text: and bring both the donkeys here to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두 나귀 모두를 나에게로 이리 끌고 오라
